mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '커피' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS coffeeTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '담배' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS cigaretteTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type = '택시' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS taxiTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN expense_type IN ('커피', '담배', '택시') THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS amountTotal FROM expense WHERE YEAR(date) = #{year} AND MONTH(date) = #{month} AND email = #{email}
